rows.label: tlk42350122_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Have you heard of Iraada Village?
It's a little village on the outskirts
of Gula.

rows.label: tlk42350122_02_msg0002
rows.name:
It's such a lovely place.
The water's clean, and the people
are all so kind.

rows.label: tlk42350122_02_msg0003
rows.name:
There's a boy called Lilio there
who would always play with us!

rows.label: tlk42350122_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I haven't been there in a while, actually.
I hope Lilio is doing well!
